description:
Hagimura takes her dog for the walk, and Shino takes a look at what other clubs are like. Kotomi and the others look at the stars, and everyone goes swimming.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Made a Good One / A Big Thing That Lights You Up / As You See, Leaking
Umai Koto Itte Yatta ze / Kimi o Terasu Ookii Sonzai / Mita manma Tarenagashi
上手いこと いってやったぜ / 君を照らす大きい存在 / 見たまんま たれ流し
